benchmark_details.name: GlotCC (An Open Broad-Coverage CommonCrawl Corpus and Pipeline for Minority Languages)
benchmark_details.overview: GlotCC is a clean, document-level, 2TB general domain corpus derived from CommonCrawl, covering more than 1000 languages, generated by an open-source reproducible pipeline.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide training data for language technologies to include a broader range of languages.

data.source: Derived from CommonCrawl CC-MAIN-2024-10 snapshot and parts from CC-MAIN-2023-40 and CC-MAIN-2023-50.

methodology.calculation: Calculated as described in the methodology section.
methodology.interpretation: An F1 score close to 1 indicates high classification quality.
methodology.validation: Self-audit performed with a random selection of 653 language subcorpora.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Licensed under CommonCrawl terms; metadata under CC0 1.0.
